answers.answer: Excessive thirst and frequent urination can both symptoms of undiagnosed diabetes, you should be checked out by your doctor to make sure.
I agree, it does sound like diabetes. There are other possibilities too. In any case, please make an appt. with your Dr.

question: For the past several months, I have noticed that when I drink water I frequently use the restroom as compared to drinking orange juice for example. Last night, I drank around 64 oz and every twenty minutes I was up to use the restroom. I couldn't sleep due to feelings of dehydration, but I drank an incredible amount of water! This morning I awoke yet again feeling dehydrated and with my heart beating a bit fast. I am 20 yrs old, eat healthily and exercise daily. What could be the problem?
title: Not retaining water; dehydration
